title: Idea with Skins
body:
This is an idea, and Rito, ill say now: Im probably thinking the same as many people
People with limited skins should be able to gift the skin to their friends
So as we all know, there are these amazing skins that rito will not release again
But most of us want it, and some of us dont have it
So how is this idea?

replies.body:
It does suck that some epic skins just will not be seen again.

But why you cant gift them from one account to another is to stop people selling them (or the accounts) for hundreds of dollars each. 
up until fairly recently when riot canceled all existing codes, you could buy Championship Riven on ebay for something like $300! and skins like PAX TF for a lot more. 

Riot doesn't like that:
1. because it means that they aren't making any money off the sale, and they'd rather you spend your $300 on skins that lead into their wallets. (which is what the whole 'legacy, not limited edition' skin line is about. 
2. (more importantly) because it's exploitation of players, and RIOT for all its flaws does actually care about the player base a lot lot more than most companies.

But unfortunately it means that you cant gift limited/legacy skins, because a black market trade will inevitably come out of it.

I personally don't think there should be ANY limited/legacy skins, everyone should be able to enjoy their favourite champion with any skin they have. The only reason to even have limited/legacy skins is to feel exclusive, and what feeling 'exclusive' really means on a psychological is: 
**"haha i have something you don't, I'm special and you're not! haha" **
Which in my opinion isn't a nice mindset at all.

You're right. it would lead to black marketing
Now ill wait for the riot skins to come back
